actions.name: Absorption Amount
actions.description: 获取或设置玩家的额外生命
actions.example:
player absorption amount
player absorption amount to 100
player absorption amount add 100

actions.name: Action Bar
actions.description: 将动作的返回值作为动作栏信息发送给执行者

actions.name: Message
actions.description: 向玩家发送一个支持 Invero 相关格式化的消息

actions.name: Money
actions.description: 将动作的返回值作为 Vault 货币判断玩家是否持有
